question: Which of the following was granted the title of Malik-ul- Tujjar, i.e., ‘Chief of the Merchants’?
explanation: Mahmud Gawan was granted the title of Malik-ul- Tujjar which means ‘Chief of the Merchants’ by the Bahmani ruler, Humayun Shah. He was 42 years old when he joined the services of Bahmani kingdom.
